about_the_game:
«Znamensk-Svir»: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers. The fleet of rolling stock is represented by: passenger electric locomotives: ChS8, ChS4T, EP1M; freight electric locomotives: 2ES5K, 3ES5K, VL80; electric trains: ED9M and ER9. Despite the fact that the route is fully electrified there is a diesel locomotive represented by locomotives of the 2TE116, 2TE10M and 2TE25A series.

«Passenger train No. 162A»: In this scenario, you will take control of the passenger train No. 162A, following the route Znamensk-Svir, led by the main electric locomotive ChS8-036. During the passage of the scenario, you will encounter intense traffic of both oncoming and passing trains. Approximate time for the passage of the script is 1 hour.
detailed_description:
«Znamensk-Svir»: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers. The fleet of rolling stock is represented by: passenger electric locomotives: ChS8, ChS4T, EP1M; freight electric locomotives: 2ES5K, 3ES5K, VL80; electric trains: ED9M and ER9. Despite the fact that the route is fully electrified there is a diesel locomotive represented by locomotives of the 2TE116, 2TE10M and 2TE25A series.

«Passenger train No. 162A»: In this scenario, you will take control of the passenger train No. 162A, following the route Znamensk-Svir, led by the main electric locomotive ChS8-036. During the passage of the scenario, you will encounter intense traffic of both oncoming and passing trains. Approximate time for the passage of the script is 1 hour.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Trainz 2019 DLC - Znamensk-Svir

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Drive this freelance 70km long double track electrified mainline set in the North West of Russia, with a pre-made session that takes you across the route with a passenger train.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
